div.pre: 18 Corinth ?, c. 1935 Burial: c. 470-450 B.C. (T) Contents: 14 AR. Corinth: 14 st. (early types; 1 with Îš on obv.) Disposition: unknown Information from Ravel and Vlasto in ANS Possibly part of the Corinth 1928 hd. published by Ravel, no. 17 above
